name: Rekrutim
description:
The Goal:  Survive as long as possible against the hoards of monsters!

How to Survive? Grow your party by finding and gathering Allies into your vicinity. Your allies will fight with you and help to protect you against the onslaught.

Who's an Ally and Enemy? Check the in game info screen to find out!

Made in Rust + Bevy

Github repo: https://github.com/Dash-L/kenneyjam_2022

Credits:

* All art assets made by Kenney

* Music used:

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/8-bit-nostalgia/2289

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/boss-time/2340

* Sound effects made in sfxr
